title: Pvp.Net patcher Kernel Is not responding
body: I just downloaded the game for the first time, i uninstalled it about 10 times, i tried every fix possible so please dont spam the admin crap i tried to go into the game files but none of the game files i need to tweak actually exist in my system, help a brother out

replies.body:
Broporo's before hoporo's {{summoner:31}} !

That kernel error means there's a good possibility that your OS doesn't have the right permissions set up to let league launch like it should. You can get those settings in place by going through our [**permission guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). Hit me back up if you have any problems along the way!
